title: Rebuild and redeploy without any code changes

requirements.text: Rebuild and redeploy the current project state without making any code changes to any file. Ensure the backend (backend/main.mo) compiles and deploys correctly, and all frontend source files are bundled and served without errors. The deployment must restore the app to its last intended state including: the BirdDataTable with all five admin-only action buttons (إضافة, تعديل, حفظ, حذف, تحرير) visible and functional for authenticated admin users; the interactive AllLocationsMap with bird filtering and show/hide toggle; the BirdGallery with admin action buttons and image click modal; the HomePage with splash screen, hero section, navigation cards, map upload section, and team table; the HamburgerMenu with all navigation links; and all TanStack Router routes correctly registered (/data, /gallery, /map, /bird/:name, /eagle-owl, /statistics, /image-view, /permissions).

quotes: لا حاول بدون ان تغير اي شيء في التطبيق

acceptanceCriteria: No source files are modified — only a clean rebuild and redeploy is performed
Backend compiles and deploys without errors
BirdDataTable renders with all five admin-only action buttons visible after admin login
BirdGallery renders with admin action buttons and image-click modal
AllLocationsMap renders with interactive Leaflet map, bird-name filter, and show/hide toggle
HomePage renders with splash screen, hero section, navigation cards, map upload section, and team table
HamburgerMenu renders with all navigation links

constraints: No code changes of any kind may be made to any file
Only a clean rebuild and redeploy of the existing codebase is permitted
nonGoals: Any code modifications, bug fixes, or feature additions
Any refactoring or restructuring of existing files
